grammarNote.title: Giving and Receiving
grammarNote.explanation:
Three verbs for the same exchange, each from a different angle.

姉に書いてあげる — writing (as a favor) FOR the sister. The action flows away from the speaker.

姉が書いてくれた — the sister wrote (as a favor) FOR ME. The action flows toward the speaker.

姉にもらった — received from the sister.

Same act, three camera angles. Re-read and determine: which direction does the favor flow in each sentence?
